name: Probatum
description:
A stealth game about mediocrity. Created for RPI's Game Dev 1 course.

You are a mediocre mage and thief traveling on a train, in search for something that will change your life for the better - a powerful relic that everyone's talking about. Beware the guards that lurk.

Casting spells will drain your mana and make you exhausted, making you slower. When you become completely exhausted, you become unable to move for a short duration.

Controls:

  • Move - WASD
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • Select magic type - 1234
  • Cast magic - Left mouse button

Kyle Hathaway - Art Lead

Sebastian Kroner - Writing Lead, Co-Director

Jose Luchsinger - Programming Lead

Emily McNee - Sound Lead, Co-Director

Beck Payne - Design Lead
